item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

then delete

                 if(startersfail <= 29){     sM("You cannot drop items yet, you have waited "+startersfail+" of the 30 mins needed.");     sM("This is to stop transferring starters, sorry!");     return;     }

item.title: Need help with a drop thing. [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) { // misc.printlnTag("droppeditem ["+playerItems[slot]+"] which is // ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]"); boolean a = true; /* * if (playerRights == 3) { sM("owner's cannot drop items."); return ; } */ if(startersfail <= 29){ sM("You cannot drop items yet, you have waited "+startersfail+" of the 30 mins needed."); sM("This is to stop transferring starters, sorry!"); return; } if (playerRights == 2) { sM("Admins cannot drop items."); return; }

Than under that there is some stuff like

if (playerName == null) return; if (droppedItem == 4708) { replaceitem2(4708, 4860); }

I think thats all the stuff to do wit the trade?

But what i want to be deleted is the 30 min thing.
I don’t want admins to trade.
but owners and hidden can…

AGAIN: I do not want it to stop drops if the player has not played for 30mins

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a drop thing. [Delta]
